snippet.title: Blossom Tales Gameplay Trailer 2016 - PC / STEAM
snippet.description:
It is up to Lily, knight of the rose, to save the Kingdom of Blossom from eternal darkness!

On her journey she has to prove herself and overcome a variety of dangerous challenges and foes, from the highest mountaintops to the deepest, monster infested dungeons. Master the use of Lily’s arsenal, whether it is bow, boomerang or magical spell, the options are countless. 

Blossom Tales is a delightful mix of well-crafted retro pixel art with a modern twist and action oriented game play, drawing you into the world of the Kingdom of Blossom! Experience the fantastic tale passed down from grandfather to grandchildren and be part of the vivid narration by influencing the course of events yourself!

Features:
20+ hours of fun
Diverse game world with many different locations 
4 challenging dungeons 
Various items impacting game play and fighting style 
Vivid story telling
